00002 #define DATA_MEMORY_T_H

00004 #define DATA_MEMORYT(_mem) {TYPE_MEMORYT, _mem}
00005 #define DEREF_TYPE_MEMORYT(_data) (memory_t *)((_data)->ptr)
00006 #define REF_TYPE_MEMORYT(_dt) _dt
00007 #define HAVEBUFF_TYPE_MEMORYT 0
00008         
00009 typedef enum memory_t_type {
00010         MEMORY_FREED = 0,
00011         
00012         MEMORY_EXACT,         // memory size is exact to hold data
00013         MEMORY_PAGE,          // memory expand granularity is page
00014         MEMORY_DOUBLE         // memory expands by doubling current size
00015 } memory_t_type;
00016 
00017 typedef enum memory_t_alloc {
00018         ALLOC_FREED = 0,
00019         ALLOC_MALLOC,
00020 } memory_t_alloc;
00021 
00022 typedef struct memory_t {
00023         void           *ptr;
00024         uintmax_t       ptr_size;
00025         uintmax_t       exact_size;
00026         uintmax_t       page_size;
00027         
00028         int             zero;
00029         memory_t_type   type;
00030         memory_t_alloc  alloc;
00031 } memory_t;
00032 
00033 API memory_t_type  memory_string_to_type(char *string);
00034 API memory_t_alloc memory_string_to_alloc(char *string);
00035 API void     memory_new(memory_t *memory, memory_t_type type, memory_t_alloc alloc, uintmax_t page_size, int zero); 
00036 API void     memory_free(memory_t *memory); 
00037 API ssize_t  memory_size(memory_t *memory, uintmax_t *size); 
00038 API ssize_t  memory_resize(memory_t *memory, uintmax_t new_size); 
00039 API ssize_t  memory_grow(memory_t *memory, uintmax_t size, off_t *pointer); 
00040 API ssize_t  memory_shrink(memory_t *memory, uintmax_t size); 
00041 API ssize_t  memory_translate(memory_t *memory, off_t pointer, uintmax_t size, void **pointer_out, uintmax_t *size_out); 
00042

00044 API size_t   memory_write  (memory_t *memory, off_t offset, void *buffer, size_t buffer_size);
